summary: Upon discovering a den of corrupt policemen, a fresh-faced journalist makes shaky allies in a jaded reporter and investigator for a powerful district attorney.
cast: Morgan Freeman|Kevin Spacey|Justin Timberlake|LL Cool J|Dylan McDermott|John Heard|Cary Elwes|Roselyn Sanchez|Damien Dante Wayans|Garfield Wilson|Marco Sanchez|Darryl Quon|Andrew Jackson|Tim Perez|Piper Perabo|Bryan Genesse|Françoise Yip|Robert Miano|BJ Harrison|Rekha Sharma|Bill Mondy|Peter Kelamis|Frank Ferrucci|Klodyne Rodney|Jacqueline Ann Steuart|Glenn Ennis|Chris Gauthier|Melanie Angel|Victoria White|Sage Brocklebank|Rachel Specter|Jim Byrnes|Brian Drummond|David Lewis|Vanesa Tomasino|Maria Louisa Figura|Steve Makaj|Vic Lippucci|David Palffy|Alexis Llewellyn|Catherine Devine|Holly Eglinton|Katya Virshilas|Jennifer Gibson|Carrie Anne Fleming|Leslie McMichael|Byron Brisco|Brett Armstrong|Robin Menzies|Claude Knowlton|Elizabeth Urrea|Monica Casio|Kristi Angus|Bobby Bysouth|Steven McMichael|Suzanne Whang
title: Ciudad sin ley
